{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Archer C20(UN)3.0 side.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC750 Wireless Dual Band Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/Archer-C20.html |sp = http://www.tp-link.com/en/download/Archer-C20_V4.html |spalt = (v1/v2/v4) |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = TP-LINK_Archer_C20_v4 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = TP-LINK |model = Archer C20 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v4.x |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC750 |series = Archer C20 |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TE7C20V4 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 161013220-4.0 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7628AN; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> V5.5 |cpu1spd = 575 <!-- 575 / 580 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W9751G6KB-25; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9751G6KB-25; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 9 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.85 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Proware |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/21/2017 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00Q0ZMIT0 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7610E; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 1 |rad2rxchains = 1 |rad2sstreams = 1 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 433 |rad2n = 150 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "161013220-4.0" and "Rev1.0sp1" is silkscreened on the board.
*Supports 802.11ac standard - the next generation of Wi-Fi *Simultaneous 2.4GHz 300Mbps and 5GHz 433Mbps :connections for 733Mbps of total available bandwidth *3 external antennas provide stable omnidirectional signal :and superior wireless coverage
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/tp-link/tp-link_archer_c20_ac750_v4 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/archer_c20_v4 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/t/tp-link-archer-c20-v4-build/8945 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = mt76x8 |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 18.06.0 |current_supported_version = <!-- auto --> |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:Archer C20(UN)3.0 front.jpg| File:Archer C20(UN)3.0 side.jpg| File:Archer-C20(UN)5.0 back.jpg| File:Archer C20(EU)5.0-pkg.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
==See also== *[[TP-LINK Archer C20 v1.x]] - AC750 Wireless Dual Band Router :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7C20 TE7C20] (2015-04-14) 2x ant., 1x USB 2.0 port *[[TP-LINK Archer C20 v2.x]] - AC900 Wireless Dual Band Router :3T3R 2.4GHz (450Mbps) + 1T1R 5GHz (433Mbps) 3x ant. *[[TP-LINK Archer C20 v4.x]] - AC750 Wireless Dual Band Router :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7C20V4 TE7C20V4] (2017-02-21) 3x ant., no USB port (v4.0) *[[TP-LINK Archer C1200 v2.x]] - AC1200 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7C1200V2 TE7C1200V2] (2017-02-23)
